title: Sino-African Cooperation: A New Turning Point [Business Africa]
desc: According to data from Boston University, Africa now sends more financial flows to China than it receives. This shift marks a significant change in the nature of economic relations between Beijing and the African continent.

title: Winter Olympics 2026: All you need to know about Milan-Cortina Games
desc: The Winter Olympics opening ceremony takes place on Friday, and for the 16 days that follow many eyes of sport lovers worldwide will be focused on the Milan-Cortina Games.

title: ASUS IoT Introduces PE1000U Rugged Fanless DIN-Rail Industrial PC

title: Singapore platform operators warn of longer delivery times following tighter laws on mobility aids
desc: The speed limit for personal mobility aids (PMAs) will be reduced from 10kmh to 6kmh from Jun 1, 2026.

title: Man stabbed to death as police cordon off Wythenshawe street
desc: A man in his 20s has died after a stabbing in a street in Northern Moor, the BBC understands.

title: MACC detains IJM Corp chairman in graft probe
desc: KUALA LUMPUR: The chairman of IJM Corporation Bhd has been detained in connection with investigations into corporate governance issues, procurement processes, financial transactions and the ownership of overseas assets estimated to be worth about RM2.5bil.
